A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Invalidates everything that happened in the original Star Wars films. Luke\, the hero of the galaxy? He's a cynical loser now who drinks sloth milk straight from the nipple. Apologists will claim that this is \"clever\" and \"original\" because it subverts expectations. That is not a valid defense. George Lucas made 6 films that told a monomyth\, that illustrated the classical heroes journey for a modern audience\, Disney clearly has no respect for the classics.\n\nTruly saddening to see such an offensive film be put in theaters around the world. This is going to break a lot of children's hearts.
